version_description:
Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app.

Our update includes new features such as icons for the recent searches, see all reviews option, prompt for users to provide location permissions when on map view and many new features, improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of the app.

Our update includes improvements, bug fixes, and new features such as: promo codes on homepage so that you never miss a great promotion, a redesigned categories page to more easily explore Groupon offerings, and more updates.

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app.

This update includes improvements, bug fixes, and new features such as: highlighting deals eligible for Groupon Select on search and browse pages, fixing several bugs that could occur when writing a review for a purchased deal, and many more!

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app. Our updates include many new features, improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app.

This update includes improvements, bug fixes, and new features such as: Improving the performance of loading deals on the search page, making it easier to see when an option for a Goods deal is sold out, showing more helpful error messages if something goes wrong trying to add to cart, and many more!

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app.

Our update includes improvements, bug fixes and new features such as: category icons in the top navigation bar, purple badges on some deals to highlight deal attributes such as 'trending', 'bestseller', 'doorbuster', etc, Groupon Select users can now see exact dollar amount saved on deals at checkout, star ratings on deals with numeric value, clearer messaging on the receipt page and more updates.

Thanks for using the Groupon app! Here at Groupon, we strive to deliver the best deals to you by improving your experience every time we release a new version of our app.

Our update includes improvements, bug fixes and new features such as; Pre-purchase booking availability, Delivery Estimates on receipt page, suggest Promo Codes in checkout, Goods options level sold out badge and more updates.

Did you know that the original meaning of the word "Perfect" meant "Done"? Our app is not perfect. In both meanings of the word.

So our team put their heads down doing lots of thinking, coding, testing, and coffee drinking, and have a new release for you today!
It's packed with fixes, new features, and essential vitamins. Don't believe me?

Then go give it a try, so you can be "Perfect" Too.

Our update includes improvements, bug fixes and many new features such as; prioritized promo code messaging at the top of the notifications tab, histogram of star ratings on reviews page, check out deal card updates, and more great updates.

This release specifically addresses the landscape orientation issue some of our customers experienced while using the app on iPad.
